sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Define Web Vitals targets, RUM, error tracking, and dashboards to maintain UX performance and reliability.

sections.title: Web Vitals Targets
sections.content: LCP < 2.5s (p75), INP < 200ms (p75), CLS < 0.1; route-level budgets and guardrails.

sections.title: RUM & Error Tracking
sections.content: Collect RUM metrics; client error tracking (Sentry); source maps; sampling and PII scrubbing.

sections.title: Dashboards & Alerts
sections.content: Performance dashboards by route; alerting for regressions and error spikes; release health.
